item.title: Should I?
item.description: Should I put some thoughts of mine here? Do I have any worth of putting here? Does it make sense? Let’s see … :-)

item.title: CV
item.description: I have been doing IT related stuff for companies of varied sizes and types for 10+ years. My experience is mainly in systems administration and IT security. I have touched several infrastructures and written quite a few scripts/programs. I try to stay on top of new technologies and practices and use them when/where appropriate. I am not bad at managing smaller projects and teams. I can communicate well with technical and non-technical folks.

item.title: Links
item.description: Pearls I found on the Internet: The saddest phone in Berlin How to daemonize a process Larry Wall on Perl, religion, and… What problems to solve xkcd - Lisp

item.title: About
item.description: I am interested in universal machines for information storage and manipulation. Among other things. To be a bit more specific, I dabble in systems administration, security and programming. I try to help other people. Buy me stuff if you want to make me happy :-). I also take some photos from time to time. And some of my (free time) software projects: quotes Profesia Jobs App::Monport lsfat checkprocs
